website_summaries.verdict: Those looking for glamour in a watch will love this model.
pros: Reviewers like the stainless steel bracelet with plenty of sparkles and accents
Many report they receive a lot of compliments when wearing this watch
cons: Price point is higher than some customers like
Watch face may be a little large for some people

customer_reviews.title: I love my watch and it was stolen 😩
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch and it was stolen 😩. I have several others but this one was my favorite. I'm praying this item come available again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well worth the actual price much less the discount that I found here...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful...a little flashy, but very classy and fit my style expectations. Verified as a real Michael Kors and also matches my pave’ engagement ring so well. I’m loving this time piece and have received many compliments just a day after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kenyata

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Piece
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this watch in sliver and gold for about 5 years now and I now have them both! I got my sliver on Amazon and Gold on Walmart.com. It is about $20-$30 cheaper at Walmart and still with free shipping. I LOVE them both! I think they are absolutely amazing! Are they blingy? Extra? Bougie? Absolutely!! However if this is your style like it is mine....Do It!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phillicia Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Watch
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on it. This is my favorite watch. It is sparkly but expensive looking and gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Theatricalme

customer_reviews.title: Defective items were sold
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item it was defective. The return policy was only good for 24 hours after delivery. I missed that window. I had to take the watch to a repair shop so that a hole could be drilled so that the watch could be worn. Not satisfied with the watch or return policy. This watch was shipped with an obvious defect. I will not buy another.
customer_reviews.author: veronica eastling

customer_reviews.title: If you like GLAM, this is the watch!
customer_reviews.text: Each year as August 1 approaches, I am looking for the perfect watch to buy myself for a birthday gift. Last year, I bought this Michael Kors in gold so decided to buy it this year in the silver. It didn't disappoint. It is probably even more glamorous than the gold version. And, it was at a great discount price!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bling Bling
customer_reviews.text: I love it. it is so classy and elegant. its a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Kimerly H.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This watch is fabulous and it was exactly what I was looking for. It exceeded my expectations!!!!! So far so good with this wonderful time piece. If you have thoughts about the authenticity of it have no worried because it is the real deal and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Cumbee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely gets a lot of attention. If you like bling, it’s for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it! I missed the sale on the current Pave style Michael Kors watches and that’s what my 18 year old daughter had on her Christmas list. I found this and crosses my fingers it would be similar. It’s beautiful and she loves it! Not too big and not too small!
customer_reviews.author: StephanieH

customer_reviews.title: Advice about this watch --- buy it and wear it often!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for almost a year and have worn it almost every day. I see some reviews of people suggesting it should be for special occasions, maybe because it is so "glitzy," but be sure it will hold up to daily wear. I even swim with it on. It looks as good now as the day I bought it. You will be happy with how beautiful it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Onlineshopper01

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch I get compliments all the time when I wear it
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch, but after 3 months the hands on the watch just starting spinning when you try to set time. I feel there should be some kind of compensation. Wore watch 6 times.
customer_reviews.author: georgeann karshner

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: So far its working and looks very pretty just as pictured
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch my husband bought for me lots and lots of compliments beautiful watch
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Looking for the smaller face/dial same exact watch
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the smaller face. I had the small face before and lost it. It looks like a mans watch. If available please let me know, would prefer smaller face.
customer_reviews.author: a.james

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife for Christmas she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: James Church

customer_reviews.title: I'M IN LOVE WITH THIS WATCH😍💚
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch late BUT when I opened the package the watch was GORGEOUS! It was heavy and bling blingy-next step was to authenticate the watch and YES IT'S THE REAL DEAL! I'M IN LOVE WITH THIS WATCH😍💚
customer_reviews.author: nichole brown

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: but one of the crystals was chipped, which i have to get fixed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you love bling, this is the watch for you!
customer_reviews.text: My watch is everything! I wear it daily, I receive compliments all the time on this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful, great quality watch
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, great quality watch. Thanks to its weight you can feel it is not a toy watch. Great for a night out but also to sparkle up every day, casual etire :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who couldn't love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Who couldn't love this watch! anniversary gift from my husband. It is really beautiful and I just love it/
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy if you’re a guy
customer_reviews.text: if you’re a guy... don’t buy it lol. I thought it would look icy but it looks extremely girly. I returned it but it was nice!
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: It was beautiful and came perfectly packaged but there was some black ...
customer_reviews.text: It was beautiful and came perfectly packaged but there was some black stuff inbetween diamonds barely noticeable but it was a gift to my mother so I was a little disappointed but she lovedddd it anyways!
customer_reviews.author: Latisha lezama

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is absolutely beautiful! I love it! It looks like a million bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grand-daughter was so happy to receive this watch for Christmas. Fast shipment and just what she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Badame

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is the bomb! I brought this watch in gold also.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my sister as a wedding gift .. she liked it
customer_reviews.author: sumayya abdulla

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: beautiful , gorgeous, exactly as advertised, and about 150 less than any store I could find it in. My wife loves it. Also loves the two year warranty it came with. Wonderful watch.
customer_reviews.author: thomas pierce

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Attention is all i can say!! I get so many compliments when i wear this watch
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Came on time
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I have the gold one also. Fits all occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Yogunda Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch people always give compliments when I wear it .
customer_reviews.author: dwayne daniels

customer_reviews.title: She has many but this one is her favorite and the cheapest one
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this watch. She has many but this one is her favorite and the cheapest one!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The watch is absolutely beautiful! Very classy piece of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought this as a gift she loved it. Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tawanna asarekokou

customer_reviews.title: It is gorgeous. The face is a little larger ...
customer_reviews.text: It is gorgeous. The face is a little larger than I expected. Couldn't decide whether it was a men's watch or ladies' - but it is lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley C. Harding

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product just what i was looking for and very fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: marlon

customer_reviews.title: I love my watch
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch... I also have the Gold one... It definitely is a showstopper. It's catches a lot of attention. The price was a plus being that I bought the Gold one at full price.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was the real deal and arrive in the time it said it would
customer_reviews.author: Ryeshedia Coley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I received this item (via my mother in Florida) as I live in Canada. There was a crystal missing from the bracelet which was not in the box either. It was obvious that this product was not inspected prior to its mailing. My expectations for superior quality when purchasing such an expensive watch were not met and the hassle to return this item is not worth the agony and cost. Again, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Bekaert

customer_reviews.title: Stunning, Thankful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely STUNNING!!!! I have no words to express how gorgeous this watch is. And at this discounted price and such fast shipping, I am so thankful for such great service! Perfect and amazing-I cannot stop staring at it :-) Do not hesitate if you like this watch! Amazing seller! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J.G

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Camile Crystal Pave Dial Crystal Encrusted Ladies Watch MK5869
product_meta.description:
Stainless steel case with a crystal encrusted stainless steel bracelet. Fixed crystal encrusted stainless steel bezel. Crystal pave dial with silver-tone hands. Index markers at the 3, 6, 9 and 12 o'clock positions. Dial Type: Analog. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant mineral crystal. Solid case back. Case diameter: 43 mm. Round case shape. Band width: 22 mm. Tri-fold clasp. Water resistant at 50 meters / 165 feet. Functions: hour, minute, second. Casual watch style. Michael Kors Camile Crystal Pave Dial Crystal Encrusted Ladies Watch MK5869.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :2.6 x 2.6 x 2.44 inches; 7.05 Ounces
 * Item model number :MK5869
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :November 2, 2013
 * Manufacturer :Michael Kors
 * ASIN :B00GJNKV24
